description: Infill lightwell  to form kitchen extension. Replacement of bedroom doors with new wooden doors. Replacement of kitchen window with wooden door to provide access from lower ground flat to patio and new metal grill over new glazed canopy to provide garden access from upper ground flat.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Design and Access Statement, Ordnance Survey Map, Site Plan, Existing Cross Section, Existing Upper Ground Floor Plan, Existing Lower Ground Floor Plan, Existing Garden Elevation, Proposed Cross Section, Proposed Lower Ground Floor Plan and  Proposed Garden Elevation all dated June 2010. [LBI REF 12361]



REASON: To comply with Section 70(1) (a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
